revised_title: Electric Conductivity and Density of Hydrogen Fluoride Solutions
tldr: This study investigates the electric conductivity and density of hydrogen fluoride solutions. The authors prepared anhydrous hydrogen fluoride and measured its conductivity and density at various concentrations. They also determined the purity of the acid and developed a method for titrating hydrogen fluoride using potassium hydrate and phenol-phthalein as an indicator. The findings provide a comprehensive understanding of hydrogen fluoride's properties and its potential applications.
